thread.section_title: Controller Chaos Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Controller Chaos | controllerchaos.com
thread.title: Jason Trendom
thread.title_full: Controller Chaos reviewed by Jason Trendom

author: Jason Trendom
title: Jason Trendom
text:
Met the staff at PAX EAST up in Boston and they were the friendliest and some of the funniest people at the venue.
Got in on the raffle and ended up purchasing a new controller from them. The finish on the controller is amazing and I have been using it in my hotel all weekend!
Can't wait to go back tomorrow and try my luck at the raffle again!
